ygData.messageBody:
According to Lim Dul:
> If you can afford it, go for a runed totem staff. About the same damage and
> delay, but it includes a small mana bonus and it's magical so you can hit
> ghouls. Going rate is about 20pp.

Given the bonus of runed totem staff (mana +5? come on), if you find a
Well-balanced Great Staff (which is also magical), you'll be probably happier.

Of course, those 5 mana *could* means the difference between ignominous death
and Gating to safety... :)

But do not invest too heavily in two-handed weapons. There appear to be goodies
that are a must in your off-hand. My best bet would be the Fanged Skull Stiletto
(damage ratio: 0.5!!!, double of runed staff), one of the favorite Rogue
weapons... that we happen to be able to wield :)

But that one is a lot further down the road :(
